discrepancies.finding: Port of Loading not stated in the credit
discrepancies.rule: f a charter party bill of lading is to indicate the port of loading stated in the credit

discrepancies.finding: No dated on board notation for each port of loading
discrepancies.rule: h when a bill of lading indicates more than one port of loading it is to evidence an on board notation with the relevant on board date for each port of loading

compliances.finding: Place of Receipt and Port of Loading are different
compliances.rule: c when a charter party bill of lading indicates a place of receipt different from the port of loading
a charter party bill of lading is to bear a dated on board notation
